titles.title: Investing in Digital Skills Act
Investing in Digital Skills Act
To amend the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act to recognize digital skills and digital literacy as critical adult education and literacy objectives, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary:
Investing in Digital Skills Act
This bill includes digital skills and digital literacy as components of adult education and literacy programs under the Workforce Innovation and Opportunity Act.
